base_template.name: TRMM_Base v1
base_template.html:
<html>

<head>
    <style>
        /* —— PDF page settings —— */
        @page {
            margin: 0.5in;
        }

        /* —— Color palette (theme) —— */
        :root {
            --header-bg: #2c3e50;
            --header-text: #ffffff;
            --border-color: #dddddd;
            --table-header-bg: #f2f2f2;
            --status-ready-bg: #eaf7ec;
            --status-ready-badge: #28a745;
            --status-not-ready-bg: #fbebee;
            --status-not-ready-badge: #dc3545;
            --status-unknown-bg: #fff9e6;
            --status-unknown-badge: #ffc107;
            --badge-already-bg: #17a2b8;
        }

        /* —— Typography & utilities (structure) —— */
        body {
            font-family: sans-serif;
            color: #333;
        }

        .section {
            margin-top: 20px;
        }

        .text-danger {
            color: var(--status-not-ready-badge);
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        /* —— Header layout (structure) —— */
        .report-header {
            background-color: var(--header-bg);
            color: var(--header-text);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .header-logo {
            width: 80px;
            margin-right: 25px;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .header-date {
            margin-left: auto;
            text-align: right;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        .report-header h1 {
            font-size: 24px;
            margin: 0 0 5px;
        }

        .report-header h2 {
            font-size: 16px;
            margin: 0;
            opacity: 0.9;
        }

        /* —— Table basics (structure) —— */
        .report-table {
            border-collapse: collapse;
            width: 100%;
            font-size: 12px;
        }

        .report-table th,
        .report-table td {
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            padding: 8px 12px;
            text-align: left;
            vertical-align: middle;
        }

        .report-table thead th {
            background-color: var(--table-header-bg);
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        /* —— Badge shape (structure) —— */
        .status-badge {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 4px 10px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 11px;
            text-align: center;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        /* —— Stub classes for per‑report overrides —— */
        .status-ready {}

        .status-not-ready {}

        .status-unknown {}

        .badge-ready {}

        .badge-not-ready {}

        .badge-unknown {}

        .badge-already {}
    </style>
</head>

<body>
    {% block content %}{% endblock %}
</body>

</html>

template.name: Antivirus Report v1.1
template.template_md:
{% block content %}

Audit Log

Client: {{ client.name }}

Report Date:
{{ report_run_timestamp.strftime('%B %d, %Y') }}

{% for item in data_sources.agentsList %} {% endfor %}
Client Site Device Name User Device OS Antivirus
{{ item.site__client__name }} {{ item.site__name }} {{ item.hostname }}
{% if item.last_seen %} 30 %} class="text-danger" {% endif %}> Last Seen: {{ item.last_seen.astimezone(ZoneInfo('America/New_York')).strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') }} {% else %} {% endif %} 		{{ item.last_logged_in_user }} {{ item.operating_system }} {% if item.custom_fields and 'Antivirus' in item.custom_fields %} {{ item.custom_fields.Antivirus }} {% endif %}
{% endblock %}
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentsList:
    filter:
      site__client_id: "{{client.id}}"
    custom_fields:
      - Antivirus
    model: agent
    only:
      - hostname
      - site__client__name
      - site__name
      - operating_system
      - site__name
      - last_seen
      - last_logged_in_user
report_run_timestamp: !now
